title: Little Witch Academia: Detarame Majo to Yousei no Kuni - Novel Updates
tags: Based on an Anime   Magic   Witches
author: Tachibana Momo   橘もも
description: It's me, Kagari Atsuko! For my dream of becoming a witch, I've come all the way from Japan to this prestigious magic academy. ...However, doing nothing but boring studies is tedious every day... One such day, I took a trip to a place where fairies are said to gather, a hill full of magical power! Here, I met with this hill's guardian, Seafla. Eh? The dog and cat she lives with have run away? All right, Lotte, Sucy and I, the three of us, go look for them! The popular TV anime's original novel!!>
